author: Slidebean
description:
MrBeast doesn’t want your views anymore, he wants to be your phone company

With the launch of Beast Mobile, Jimmy Donaldson is expanding his business into telecommunications, a sector defined by recurring revenue and infrastructure.

At the same time, his team is exploring a public offering designed to allow fans to become shareholders.

If executed, this model would redefine how creator led companies scale:
audiences wouldn’t just consume or subscribe, they would own a stake in the business itself.

👉 Visit our YouTube channel for more content.
title: MrBeast’s next move turns audiences into owners
